0000177888-d-03-12-03-IC.Narrative: CREW OCCUPIE SIDING IN PLANNED WORK AUTHORITY.  TRACK INSPECTOR INSTRUCTED CREW OF SRS858 (SPERRY RAIL DETECTOR) IN JOB BRIEFING THAT THEY WOULD FOLLWO HIM BACKING SOUTH DOWN THE SIDING AND TO STOP ATTHE SIGNAL.  THEY WAIT FOR A NORTH BOUND TRAIN TO PASS AND THEN TEST NORTH.  INSPECTOR BACKED HIS TRUCK SOUTH TO THE SIGNAL, STOPPED AND GOT OUT OF HIS TRUCK TO DO ROO-BY INSPECTION WHILE WAITING FORSRS858 TO ARRIVE AT SIGNAL.  THE SRS858 BACKED SOUTH AT APPROXIMATELY 9 MPH, DID NOT STOP AT SIGNALAS INSTRUCTED AND STRUCK UNOCCUPIED TRACK.  SRS858 WAS BEING OPERATED BY CONTRACTOR AT TIME OF OCCURRANCE.  DAMAGE TO HI-RAIL WAS $13,171; DAMAGE TO SPERRY CAR $750.

KS0303114-d-03-15-03-BNSF.Narrative: C NAMPAM0 62 PULLING INTO TRACK A7, HEAD 43 CARS PASSED OVER A6/7 SWITCH INTO A7, 44TH CAR, JHMX 95129 WENT INTO TRACK A6 COLLIDING WITH BNSF 8890, LEAD LOCOMOTIVE ON THE E PAMNAM0 55 IN A6.  COLLISION CAUSED THE JHMX 95129 AND FOLLOWING 3 LOADED COAL CARS TO TURN ON THEIR SIDE AND DERAILED THE "A"END TRUCKS OF JHMX 95312.  A6/7 SWITCH WAS LINED FOR MOVEMENT INTO A6 WHEN INSPECTED DURING INITIALINVESTIGATION.  THIS IS A PUSH BUTTON SOLAR SWITCH.  CAUSE CODE M599 SELECTED BECAUSE THE SOLAR POWERED SWITCH MALFUNCTIONED - THE CONTROL MAST HAD BEEN DAMAGED EARLIER AND A FRAYED WIRE WAS NOT DETECTED.  DURING OPERATION, THE WIRE SHORTED AND ACTUATED THE SWITCH CAUSING THE DERAILMENT.  DIV. ENG.TAKES EXCEPTION TO T311 AS IT S/B A PRODUCT LIABILITY ISSUE RATHER THAN TRACK RELATED.
